mapper.insert: insert into MSM_USER(u_id, u_pwd, u_name, u_email) values(#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_email})
mapper.select: select * from MSM_USER where u_id=#{0} and u_pwd=#{1}
select u_id from MSM_USER where u_email=#{0}
select u_email from MSM_USER where u_id=#{0} and u_name=#{1} and u_email=#{2}
mapper.update: update MSM_USER set u_pwd=#{1} where u_id=#{0}
update MSM_USER set u_pwd=#{1} where u_id={0}
mapper.select: select u_id from MSM_USER where u_id=#{u_id}
